name: Kingdom of Greece
startIntroPart1: O Greece, yearning for peace and prosperity, your king, George I, will now lead your nation. Combine the ancient heritage with modern wisdom to open a new era.
startIntroPart2: Your nation stands ready to move beyond the glory of the past toward an even greater future.
declaringWar: You are in my way, you must be destroyed.
attacked: As a matter of fact I too grow weary of peace.
defeated: You have somehow become my undoing! What kind of beast are you?
introduction: I am George I, King of Greece. I will dedicate myself to my country and carve out its glorious future.
tradeRequest: My friend, does this seem reasonable to you?
uniques: [Land] units gain the [Independent Army] promotion <hidden from users>
[Water] units gain the [Independent Army] promotion <hidden from users>
Comment [Non-Air Units receive a +15% Combat Bonus when defending]

name: Kingdom of Romania
startIntroPart1: O Romania, where tradition and innovation intertwine, the time has come for your king, Carol I, to lead the nation. We shall not forget our roots as we stride toward the future.
startIntroPart2: I will pave the way to restore the glory of this land and bring prosperity to all.
declaringWar: You are in my way, you must be destroyed.
attacked: As a matter of fact I too grow weary of peace.
defeated: You have somehow become my undoing! What kind of beast are you?
introduction: I am Carol I, King of Romania. I pledge to dedicate myself to the development and prosperity of my country.
tradeRequest: My friend, does this seem reasonable to you?
uniqueName: The Only Latin In The Balkans
uniques: [+5]% Production when constructing [Military] units [in all cities] <upon declaring a defensive pact>

name: Kingdom of Montenegro
startIntroPart1: O Montenegro, rich in history and courage, the time has come for your king, Nicholas I, to lead the nation. Let us honor our traditions as we prepare to embrace a new era.
startIntroPart2: We shall embark once more on the journey toward freedom and independence.
declaringWar: You are in my way, you must be destroyed.
attacked: As a matter of fact I too grow weary of peace.
defeated: You have somehow become my undoing! What kind of beast are you?
introduction: I am Nicholas I, King of Montenegro. I promise dedication to my country and a hopeful future for our people.
tradeRequest: My friend, does this seem reasonable to you?
uniques: Gain a free [Walls] [in all cities] <in [Hill] tiles>
New [Military] units start with [5] Experience [in all cities]

name: Kingdom of Bulgaria
startIntroPart1: O Bulgaria, where culture and tradition blend, the time has come for your king, Ferdinand I, to lead the nation. Proud of our ancient heritage, we shall stride toward a new future.
startIntroPart2: Let us walk together on the path to prosperity and progress.
declaringWar: You are in my way, you must be destroyed.
attacked: As a matter of fact I too grow weary of peace.
defeated: You have somehow become my undoing! What kind of beast are you?
introduction: I am Ferdinand I, King of Bulgaria. I pledge my dedication to the prosperity of my country and the great future ahead.
tradeRequest: My friend, does this seem reasonable to you?
uniques: [+35]% Production when constructing [Melee] units [in all cities]

name: Kingdom of Serbia
startIntroPart1: O Serbia, land of glory and courage, the time has come for your king, Peter I, to lead the nation. We shall cherish our traditions and history as we stride toward a new era.
startIntroPart2: Let us walk together on the path of freedom and unity.
declaringWar: You are in my way, you must be destroyed.
attacked: As a matter of fact I too grow weary of peace.
defeated: You have somehow become my undoing! What kind of beast are you?
introduction: I am Peter I, King of Serbia. I pledge my dedication to the prosperity of my country and the unity of my people.
tradeRequest: My friend, does this seem reasonable to you?

name: Sublime Ottoman State
startIntroPart1: O Ottoman Empire, the moment has come to revive your glory, as your Sultan, Mehmet V, leads the nation. Embracing our traditions and culture, we shall usher in a new era.
startIntroPart2: With strong unity, we will march toward the future.
declaringWar: Your continued insolence and failure to recognize our preeminence leads us to war.
attacked: Good. The world shall witness the incontestable might of my armies and the glory of the Empire.
defeated: Ruin! Ruin! Istanbul becomes Iram of the Pillars, remembered only by the melancholy poets.
introduction: I am Mehmet V, Sultan of the Ottoman Empire. I pledge my dedication to the prosperity of the empire and the happiness of my people.
tradeRequest: Let us do business! Would you be interested?
uniques: [-20]% Production when constructing [Military] units [in all cities]
[+50]% Production when constructing [Janissary] units [in all cities] <hidden from users>
